class.name: UtilityServer
class.description: The UtilityServer handles the agent think function on a separate thread. When agents think, they are added to a queue, and then they think in order. Only one agent can think per game frame. This prevents agents from choosing actions that get disabled by other agents on the same game frame.

method.name: action_set_active
method.description: Changes whether the action specified by rid is active for agents to select.

method.name: action_set_advert
method.description: Sets the advert values for the action specified by rid.

method.name: action_set_object_id
method.description: Sets the instance id of the action node which is selected when an agent chooses this action.

method.name: action_set_position
method.description: Set the global position of the action specified by rid.

method.name: action_set_spatial_weight
method.description: Sets the spatial weighting for the action specified by rid.

method.name: action_set_tags
method.description: Sets the tags for the action specified by rid.

method.name: agent_choose_action
method.description: Adds an agent to the think queue. The position should be its global position.

method.name: agent_get_need_score
method.description: Gets the need score for the need name for the agent specified by rid. Need scores which decay are evaluated lazily, and there is a 100ms window where it will not be reevaluated.

method.name: agent_get_needs
method.description: Gets the needs for the agent specified by rid.

method.name: agent_grant
method.description: Alter the agent's need values by the need-score values. Needs that are not present will be ignored silently.

method.name: agent_set_action_callback
method.description: Set the callback which should be called when an action is selected by an agent. The callback should take an action node as a parameter.

method.name: agent_set_consideration
method.description: Set the agent's consideration fraction and weight.

method.name: agent_set_decaying
method.description: Sets whether the agent's needs which decay are decaying or not.

method.name: agent_set_need_score
method.description: Force a value onto a need for an agent specified by rid.

method.name: agent_set_needs
method.description: Sets the needs that the agent has. This will preserve need values for needs which are retained.

method.name: agent_set_no_action_callback
method.description: Set the callback which should be called when an agent can't find an appropriate action.

method.name: create_agent
method.description: Make an agent. Also initializes the worker thread when the first agent is created.

method.name: free_rid
method.description: Delete an action or agent for the given rid.
